tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sudhir Seth is a perfect consultant and  surgeon  for any and all type of orthopedic problems.  *** **** ** ** * **** ******* he is also a very nice person and would involve fully till his patient is satisfied.  My mother is 86years old and by chance broke her hip bone when she fell down at home on the intervening night of 24th and 25th night i.e Saturday-Sunday night.  My mother was in great pain, we visited Shri Balaji Action hospital in Paschim Vihar who informed us that there was fracture in the right neck of femur.  They did not admitted her for want of Corona Test negative report.  After giving a pain relieving injection they asked us to come on Monday with Corona Test report.  On Sunday on the advice of a relative, I contacted Dr. Sudhir Seth and informed him of my mother's ill health.  He asked me to bring mother to Fortis DOC Hospital, opposite Nehru Place where he arranged operation for Monday.  Immediately on our arrival, hospital carried out all the necessary tests as per the direction of the doctor.  Since my mother has heart problem since 2015, Dr. Seth consulted a heart specialist who after Eco Test asked the Doctor to take the patient to a hospital which is better facilitated with heart equipment and aids.  Dr. Seth without wasting time managed booking with National Heart Institute, East of Kailash and made his best efforts by using his contacts take morning slot to operate my mother on 27th October (Tuesday).  It was about 4 hours successful operation conducted by Dr. Sudhir Seth in the presence of cardiologist.  Very next day on Wednesday, Doctor helped my mother to see that she walks with the support of a walker.  My mother has been discharged on 30th October with stable condition.  With the blessings of Almighty and sincere efforts made by Dr. Seth, my mother has got extended lease of her life.  Our entire family is very happy and thank Dr. Seth for his experienced hands in saving many such people who are not sure which Doctor to be consulted for Orthopedic problems.  With my this message, I would suggest Dr. Sudhir Seth  is one of the best Orthopedic consultant and surgeon in NCR who is very cooperative and accessible.

I visited Dr Sudhir Seth's clinic for my knee pain few days ago. Feeling a lot better already. The clinic is well equipped. Doctor Seth is very systematic and thorough and has a holistic approach. Even though in today's world everything can be googled an experienced doctor's advice is invaluable. I feel grateful and strongly recommend him.

I went to the doctor with a very nominal lower back pain on 8 of Feb. He did a couple of xray and suggested some medicine for 20 days informing that it's just because of your sitting posture and working constantly in a sitting mode with a session with physiotherapy at his chamber. *** *** ******* **** **** *** *** **** ***** ******** **** *** * he firstly charged me a consultation once again when it was less than 1month and asked me to go for a MRI through his known clinic. * **** *** ****** ** **** ***** ** ******** ***** **** **** * ********* As the doc was pushing me to go and do the MR quickly along with back to back from that clinic ** *** ******* ******* ***** *** ********* *** ************** * **** **** ****** *** ** *** ********  Now I stopped visiting the same clinic, just becoz nither it helped me with my problem, but I already end up spending some 8k **** **** ** ********* I am not Judging the doctors experience. *** *** ******* ** ***** **** *** ******** ** *** ** *** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for leg and foot pain. The doctor had x-ray machine in his orthopoint and he told his staff to carry out 5 x-rays for the same and then prescribed a lot of medicines.

I was already taking reputed multi vitamins but the doctor ignored them and prescribed his multi-vitamins which was very costly.  The doctor also prescribed taking paracetamol for 10 continuous days ****** * *** *** **** *** ***** ** ****

I had very minor pain on account of weight gain *** *** ****** ***** ** ****** ** **** ***** ** *** ******** *** **** I took the medicines for 10 days and when I did not get any relief then I consulted the another doctor a** **** * *** ** **** **** ***** *** ** *********** ** *** *** * ****** ** **** ** *** *** **** *** **** ** ******* ** ****** ***** 

The behaviour of the receptionist was very bad. There was another patient who was known to the doctor and the doctor and the  receptionist gave extra discount to that patient in medicines. I requested the receptionist  to give me some extra discount as I already paid a lot of money for 5 xrays but the receptionist  started shouting at me.


I would definitely not recommend this doctor at all.
All physiotherapy machines are not working properly.after spend more than eight thousand but no relief.only constantly giving medicines .

Dr. Sudhir was quite thorough in checking the issue but he suggested 3 XRays and I felt that was suggested because of in-clinic facility. I did not get proper reports of the XRays despite asking (which for same price you will get in any other center) so I could not use it for a 2nd consultation. After a lot of insisting they had just allowed me to click some pictures of the XRays but even that did not have any diagnostics. He suggested some 7-8 medicines but all of them were only available in his clinic and nowhere in the market. 
So I was not satisfied with treatment. Later I had to show to another doctor and seek consultation

Judgemental and not Professional

This review is for my wife’s appointment. Went for a basic checkup on a sprain. X-ray was done instantly and medicines were prescribed. In the interest of complete disclosure, we explained the current medications she is on, but were rather met with a lot of judgement.
He took a picture of her current prescription without permission and blatantly asked us to stop our psychiatric medication and said these things are not required. We were asked to listen to some positive “gurus” and speeches instead of taking medication for her mental health. **** ****** ** ******* ** ********** ** ****** ******** *** ** ********* ** ****** ******** ** ********* ****** ****** ** ** ** *** * ********* *************
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback.
 The history of your psychiatric medicines taken over time could have a negative effect on neuromuscular reflexes. I suggested you for a review with your psychiatrist .
However, your feedback is well-taken 
Thanks

review: The doctor is highly experienced *** ************* *** ** *** *** ** ***** ******* ** *** ** ** ********** ***** *** ********* ************** The final straw was when he referred me to a scan centre and they were asking for 3x the usual rate at other centres. No prizes for guessing why! Considering the patients are already paying a good consultation fee, the least we expect is that our best interests be protected.

Doctor is good but i think he is very greedy as well. He wrote too many tests and also he conducted three xrays. The xrays can be done in his labs and the cost of each xray is Rs 500. Practo was showing fees as Rs 700 but when we went there his assistant asked for Rs 1000 as it was a Sunday. Also we had taken a time but we were asked to wait as there were patients before us as well. So what was the point of taking appointment through Practo. 

Doctor is certainly good as the pain has reduced significantly . But make sure to shell out more money. They also provide medicine and supplements which are costlier then other medical shops.

We are not satisfied at all 
We had visited to him three times but every time we gain disappointment and feel bad bcz he is always pressurised you to avail his in house therepy most of the time ************* 
We would not recommend him to any family or friends

reply_text:
I just checked that  Mrs Rohilla Shah  visited  on 25th  July with Back ache and overweight.A sum of Rs 1180 (not 11800) were spent on consultation(800) and  Rs 380  medicines.
Yes i  failed to check my email ( I saw today) and called u today 15th AUGUST
Its better to ring up than text or message( Suits me)
I discovered that you feel better and have improved
Dr Sudhir Seth

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Heard a lot about Dr Sudhir, which is why i showed trust and visited him 4 times and ended up spending 20k at his clinic. The doctor doesn't care if your problem gets solved or not, he just saw me for 5-6 mins each time and never cared to listen about the problem. He just wrote tons of medicines everytime. Only because of the fact that i’d heard so much about how good a Doctor he is, i decided to show blind trust and kept coming back every month only to burn a hole in my pocket. ** **** **** ***** *** **** ** ****** *** each time he said it’ll be fine till next month, keep continuing the medicines. ***** *** **** *** ** ******* ************** *** ******** *** ********* ** ** ******* ******** I had a very disappointing experience and would never prefer to seek treatment from him moving forward.

Very bad experience.
1. Medicines are not available anywhere expect Dr.Seth’s clinic.
2. **** *** *** ******* ***** ******** ******, the person who is assigned to pack the medicine didn’t pack all the medicines pain killer medicine was missing and they even feel like informing that they don’t have medicine in stock even after asking them 2-3 times that all the medicines are been packed.
3. The alternative medicine that were recommended are also nowhere available.
4. I had to again visit the clinic to collect medicine and inform about the issue to Dr.Seth instead to taking action against this Dr.Seth said they are busy might have slipped off there mind and wrote 6 more medicine.
** ******* ******* ** *** ******* ***** *** ******** ******.

Will never visit Dr.Seth’s clinic neither will recommend anyone.
Excellent, very friendly,  very good at listening to the patient's problem, excellent knowledge about his subject, very humane approach towards the patient
Doctor explained the problem very well and suggested treatment for my problem and overall good experience

Poor service 
Not satisfied
High wait time more than 2 hrs
High charge
Staff rude behaviour not friendly
Dr Seth is extremely gentle, professional and kind. X-ray , diagnosis was done so well , waiting was also not much. 👌👍🏼

Doctor is very qualified & experienced, he always advice/ suggest ****** medicine/ treatment on time.
I'm really very much satisfied.
I have tried many doctor to resolve my issue but nothing works out but after geting treatment under Dr. Sudhir Seth I am recovering very well.

He is very experience and friendly doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sudhir Seth is an excellent human being, and a very empathetic person. He understands the issue with great deal of patience and with his excellent knowledge provides the most optimal solution to the problem. May God bless you Sir

Dr seth was very helpful.  He was patient and listened to my problem very carefully. He immediately found the solution for my problem and advised me what to do. I would definitely recommend him to my family and friends.

Apart from high waiting time  ,When I was in chamber with me there was another patient too . I was quite uncomfortable. He was repeatedly saying go for x ray and giving appointment for this, when I told him that I have to go out now, , I will come after 10 days.He said  that it is okay, no problem, when you come, get it done.  I was like surprised what it is if it is necessary then it need treatment ASAP.  Not satisfied

They send patients in a group to save time but ofcourse charge the same amount of consultation. His solution for most issues is to stop doing whatever form of exercise you are doing and do whatever he asks you to do. Even for medicines he insists that you should buy only from his clinic.

I had a knee problem in 2011. I went to his clinic and am satisfied of the treatment I had. 
The place is small but the doctor is very good. He explained to me the problem and advised me well. He did not recommend the surgery (which is rare as many doctors prefer to operate) but I was in a hurry due to travel requirements. 
I have and would still recommend him.

*** ****** *** **** he explained the issue thoroughly. The only problem was there half an hour waiting time. But we understand it's not something that doctors can help as they have to attend all patients properly. We are just in the initial stage of treatment. Will complete the review once the treatment is complete.
